Articles.Content:
Hello. I play Kerbal Space Program on Steam, and use Steam on an iMac. I run OS X Sierra. I cannot understand how to download spacecraft or mods. I would greatly appreciate anyone who would help me with this issue.

Thanks!

An Imperial-II class Star Destroyer

Edited April 7, 2018 by Imperial Star Destroyer
Edited last bits. It didn’t seem right.

Hi Mr Destroyer,  welcome to the forums.

 I'm moving this thread to the technical support thread as it makes more sense here.

There's a few old threads about this issue before, you can give  them a go as a starting point. (

My favorite method is CKAN, you can find it in the mod thread.

One other thing, @Imperial Star Destroyer,

If you run into further problems, please do post here in the forums-- as you can see, people here are friendly and helpful. 

One bit of advice:  whenever you post with a question or problem, it's probably a good idea to mention that you're on a Mac, as you did here.  Reason:  Most KSP players are on Windows PCs, and Mac users tend to be a small minority.  Sometimes things are different on the Mac than they are on Windows, and if you don't mention your OS, there's a good chance folks may just assume you're on Windows, and may offer advice that might not apply to you.

Best of luck, and hope you have fun with using mods!
